apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji, as seen on Apple devices, captures a loving kiss between two women, with their dark and medium-light skin tones rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The soft rounded edges of their faces and the gentle blush on their cheeks convey warmth and affection. Itâ€™s a beautiful representation of love, partnership, and diverse relationships, adding a heartfelt touch to any message.
